channel.title: Anyone know how to make comp cape have more particles? and change colors?
channel.description: hey guys i really am not working on anything at the moment too big but i would just like to see if anyone kind enough would show me how to change the color of the comp cape particles and the particle amount if you know what i mean like a thicker fog. Thanks so much guys for your time in advance.
